Headline: #20 Madison buses Temporary Reroute at Madison/Pulaski
ShortDescription: 20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Pulaski, Jackson, Hamlin and Madison: due to police activity near Madison/Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Pulaski, Jackson, Hamlin and Madison: due to police activity near Madison/Pulaski.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Montrose
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Montrose due to a door problem on train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Montrose due to a door problem on train.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
